title: Corridor connecting the entrance / exit for the differently abled :- The corridor connecting the ent
clause_text: Corridor connecting the entrance / exit for the differently abled :- The corridor connecting the entrance / exit for differently abled, leading directly outdoors to a place where information concerning the overall use of the specified building can be provided to visually impaired persons either by a person or by signs, shall be provided as follows :-

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
